Traits.Name: Winged
Traits.Description: Gains flying at start of their turn. Loses flying if dazed, winded, staggered, or stunned.

Actions.Name: Stab
Actions.Hit: Deal light physical damage. Boost damage and gains pierce if the target has no allies adjacent.

Actions.Name: Swoop
Actions.Description: End turn and leave the battlefield. Return to the battlefield in a free space at start of next turn.

Actions.Name: Dive
Actions.Description: Fly in a line 3 area effect. One character within the area must save or take fray damage, be shoved to the end of the line, and become blinded.
